title: FG urges Israel to invest in 519MW dams
content: The Federal Government has urged Israeli investors to invest in various dams in Nigeria that have the capacity to generate 519 megawatts of electricity for irrigation purposes. According to the government, its request for investments by Israeli entrepreneurs was prompted by the advanced technological development in the foreign nation in the management of dams for power generation and for irrigation.
